name: SweetWater Brewing Company
description: Atlanta's largest craft brewery, known for its wide range of beers and lively atmosphere

name: Monday Night Brewing
description: This Atlanta-based brewery focuses on balanced, flavorful ales and has multiple locations, including "The Garage" for barrel-aged and sour beers

name: Three Taverns Brewery
description: Known for its interpretation of traditional Belgian-style beers with an American twist, Three Taverns has a taproom called "The Parlour" in Decatur

name: Orpheus Brewing
address: 1440 Dutch Valley Pl NE, Atlanta, GA 30324
description: This Atlanta brewery specializes in sour and saison beer styles, with a location near the Atlanta BeltLine's Eastside Trail

name: Terrapin Beer Co.
description: Founded in 2002, Terrapin Beer Co. offers a wide range of craft beers and is known for its live music events and pet-friendly outdoor space

name: Scofflaw Brewing Company
description: Recognized for its high-gravity stouts and sours, Scofflaw Brewing Co. has multiple locations and is committed to being a force for good in the community

name: Wild Heaven Beer
address: 1010 White St SW, Atlanta, GA 30310 (West End Brewery) and 135B Maple Street, Decatur, GA 30030 (Original Brewery)
description: Wild Heaven Beer brews culinary and botanically-driven beers and has three taproom locations, offering a variety of craft beers, ciders, and wines

name: Arches Brewing
address: 2903 RN Martin St, East Point, GA 30344
description: Located in East Point, Arches Brewing focuses on traditional lagers and inspired ales, with a taproom and onsite kitchen

name: Cherokee Brewing + Pizza Company
description: This Dalton establishment offers brick oven pizza and a wide selection of craft beers, with a focus on local brews and Southern roots

name: Red Hare Brewing & Distilling
address: 1998 Delk Industrial Blvd SE, Marietta, GA 30067
description: Red Hare Brewing Company, established in 2011, was one of the first craft breweries in Georgia to can their beer and offers a variety of year-round and seasonal brews
